about_the_game:
The long-awaited arcade version "Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai Version 3" is finally making its debuts on Steam!

New Playable Character "Jokō Kōmei," and New Strategist "Kakuka Hōkō," have been added to version 3 and renewed the motion graphics of existing characters!



The complicated system has also been reworked to improve the playability. The improvement includes adding a button dash and reintegrating the Special Down system into the Hougeki Combo. The challenger mode and training mode has also been readjusted for version 3.

Get ready for the new kinds of epic battles you'd expect when warlords of ancient China clash!

Major Changes:

  • Version 3 is the same as the latest arcade version.
  • Added new playable character "Jokō" and strategist "Kakuka."
  • Revamped animation of existing characters.
  • Added button dash.
  • Reintegrating Special Down into Hougeki combos, and reworked a few key features to reduce the complexity of the system.
  • Re-adjusted Challenge Mode and Training Mode to match version 3.
  • New opening movie.
  • Added new stage and new BGM.

Price Revision

In order for more people to enjoy the game, we have revised the price of "Koihime Enbu: RyoRaiRai" from $19.99 to $11.99 with the release of Version 3.

Attention

This version is an update on DLC and requires the base game "Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai" on Steam in order to play.

New motion graphics examples

  • Sonken

  • Chōhi

name: Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai - Version 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: Xbox 360 compatible controller recommended

short_description: New Playable Character "Jokō Kōmei," and New Strategist "Kakuka Hōkō" arrives with renewed animation for existing characters!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
